targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(jobs.started,$__interval),
  count(distinct(jobs.id)) AS "id"
FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(jobs.started,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,$__interval,0),
  count(id) AS "id"
FROM chat_jobs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,$__interval,0)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(log_time,$__interval),
  count(id) AS "id"
FROM tacacs_acct
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(log_time) AND device LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND device LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND device LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(log_time,$__interval)

SELECT now() as time_sec, jobs.status, count(distinct(jobs.id)) from jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )
GROUP BY status

SELECT 
    sum(playbook_cost.cost) / 60
FROM
    jobs
LEFT JOIN playbook_cost ON 
    playbook_cost.playbook = jobs.playbook
LEFT JOIN job_hosts ON 
    jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )
select user as User, count(distinct(id))as Chat FROM chat_jobs WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) group by user;

SELECT jobs.created_by as User, count(distinct(jobs.id)) as Jobs FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job WHERE $__timeFilter(started)AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) ) GROUP BY created_by;

SELECT tacacs_acct.user as User, count(distinct(tacacs_acct.id)) as "Manual" FROM tacacs_acct WHERE $__timeFilter(tacacs_acct.log_time) AND tacacs_acct.device LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND tacacs_acct.device LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND tacacs_acct.device LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") GROUP BY user;

SELECT 
    sum(playbook_cost.cost) * 1.083333
FROM
    jobs
LEFT JOIN playbook_cost ON 
    playbook_cost.playbook = jobs.playbook
LEFT JOIN job_hosts ON 
    jobs.id = job_hosts.job    
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started)AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(job_hosts.host)) FROM `job_hosts`  LEFT JOIN jobs on job_hosts.job = jobs.id WHERE
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )

select ((chat.chat + jobs.jobs) / (chat.chat + jobs.jobs + cli.cli) * 100) from
  (select count(id) as chat from chat_jobs where $__timeFilter(timestamp) ) chat,
  (select count(distinct(jobs.id)) as jobs FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job WHERE
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook)) ) jobs,
  (select count(tacacs_acct.id) as cli from tacacs_acct WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) AND device LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND device LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND device LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%")) cli;

SELECT
  AVG(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(jobs.finished) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(jobs.started)) as metric
FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started)AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )

SELECT job_hosts.host, count(job_hosts.host) as metric FROM `job_hosts` LEFT JOIN jobs on job_hosts.job = jobs.id WHERE
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) ) GROUP BY job_hosts.host order by metric desc

SELECT job_hosts.host, count(job_hosts.host) as metric FROM `job_hosts` LEFT JOIN jobs on job_hosts.job = jobs.id WHERE (job_hosts.failures > 0 or job_hosts.unreachable > 0) AND
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) ) GROUP BY job_hosts.host order by metric desc

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(jobs.started,$__interval,0),
  jobs.playbook AS metric,
  count(distinct(jobs.id)) AS "id"
FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started) AND
  status = 'successful' AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started,$__interval,0)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(jobs.started,$__interval,0),
  jobs.playbook AS metric,
  count(distinct(jobs.id)) AS "id"
FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started) AND
  status = 'failed' AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started,$__interval,0)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(jobs.started,$__interval,0),
  jobs.playbook AS metric,
  count(distinct(jobs.id)) AS "id"
FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started) AND
  status = 'successful' AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started,$__interval,0)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(jobs.started,$__interval,0),
  jobs.playbook AS metric,
  count(distinct(jobs.id)) AS "id"
FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started) AND
  status = 'failed' AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started,$__interval,0)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(jobs.started,$__interval,0),
  jobs.status AS metric,
  count(distinct(jobs.id)) AS "id"
FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started,$__interval,0)

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(started,$__interval,0), jobs.playbook, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(jobs.finished) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(jobs.started)) as Execution from jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) ) ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started,$__interval,previous)

SELECT job_hosts.host, sum(job_hosts.changed)as changed, sum(job_hosts.failures) as failures, sum(job_hosts.ok) as ok, sum(job_hosts.unreachable) as unreachable, sum(job_hosts.skipped) as skipped FROM `job_hosts`  LEFT JOIN jobs on job_hosts.job = jobs.id WHERE
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )   GROUP BY job_hosts.host

SELECT
  jobs.playbook as Playbook, AVG(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(jobs.finished) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(jobs.started)) as Execution
FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(jobs.started)AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )
group by playbook

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(jobs.started,$__interval,0),
  jobs.playbook AS metric,
  count(jobs.playbook) AS "playbook"
FROM jobs LEFT JOIN job_hosts on jobs.id = job_hosts.job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started) AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Site%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Stage%", "'", "%") AND host LIKE REPLACE("$Device%", "'", "%") AND (jobs.playbook like TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM "$Playbook") OR jobs.playbook IN ($Playbook) )
GROUP BY 1, playbook,2
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started,$__interval,0)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,$__interval),
  command AS metric,
  count(id) AS "id"
FROM chat_jobs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,$__interval)

SELECT
  command, count(distinct(id)) as total
FROM chat_jobs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
group by command;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,$__interval,0),
  command AS metric,
  count(command) AS "command"
FROM chat_jobs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1, command ,2
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,$__interval,0)
